short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RWA-Wallet.com: The world's first RWA Wallet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NFTs keep falling as most do not have a profit model.

Twitter KoL now needs to pay $8/month to get a blue checkmark, and it's not decentralized.

We provide a Chrome extension with RWA-Protocol to make it happen on Web3.

Twitter KoL can issue a new NFT with a limited total number as their account/brand's "share", and their readers/subscribers can buy their shares.

And then Twitter KoL can publish new content with NFT-gating, so only the shareholders can unlock the member-only content.

The more important thing is the "share" NFT has a limited number, such as 10K, what if more than 10K users want to unlock the NFT-gating content?

We provide the Twitter KoL an additional option "One Time Payment SBT" that they can specify a much lower price for this OTP-SBT (as the "share" NFT price must be much higher than the OTP-SBT), the SBT is attached to the specific content only and can not be sold/transfer to other wallets. And all the income from the SBT will be share 10% to the "Share" NFT holders.

This solution makes the NFT industry healthier, as NFT not only has some images but consumable content that have profit, the profit gets shared with the NFT shareholders.
We provide a Chrome extension that injects relative widgets onto Twitter web pages to help Twitter web user to make the action much easier. This also helps our platform can siphon traffic.
